original_title: Durian musicals to a theme park: How this Malaysian company is innovating with the world’s most divisive fruit | CNN Business
article_summary: "Malaysia's DurianBB Park offers unique durian tasting experiences, aiming to make sampling the divisive fruit a cultural must-do. Despite a slowing growth trajectory in the durian market, companies like DurianBB are innovating with durian-themed attractions, intellectual property, and educational programs."</s>
